data.title: key fact statement: Joyalukkas Exchange
data.meta_description: Read the statement to learn more about the products and services
data.text:
Joyalukkas Exchange

(Licensed by ‘The Central Bank of UAE’)

Key Fact Statement

REMITTANCE

Joyalukkas Exchange offers financial services that entail money transfers, frequently across the globe, between individuals or entities. It provides a means for users to transfer money both domestically and globally to friends, family, or enterprises located in different regions.

To make remittance transfers easier for its consumers, Joyalukkas Exchange has tied up with several correspondents. Joyalukkas Exchange retains the right to choose the correspondent for remittance execution upon receiving a Remittance Order from a customer. It is important to note that all correspondents engaged by Joyalukkas Exchange have received approval from the ‘Central Bank of the United Arab Emirates’.

Our arrangement allows you to send remittances as:

Outbound: Transfer to UAE Bank Account

Outbound: Transfer to International Bank Accounts

Outbound: Cash Pick-up

Outbound: Transfer to Mobile Wallets

Inbound: Cash payouts from counters

Value Added Products

WAGE PROTECTION SYSTEM(WPS)

In order to accomplish the objectives, set forth by the Ministry of Human Resources and Emiratization (MOHRE), the Wages Protection System (WPS) was introduced at the Central Bank of the UAE (CBUAE). The purpose of WPS is to give employers a reliable, safe, efficient, and effective way to pay their workers’ salary on time. In the methodology that CBUAE has chosen, information is transferred from the employer to the contractual agents in order to pay the employees' salary. Before sending the salaries data to the agents, CBUAE secures the funds from the employers.

WPS Participants

Workers: Each and every individual who works in the private, public or domestic sector in return for agreed-upon wages and who has a work permit

Employers: An individual or whoever owns a company or institution registered with the Ministry and hires one or more workers in return for agreed-upon wages.

Agent: Any banks or financial institution approved and authorized by the Central Bank of the UAE to offer wages payment services via WPS. The Central Bank of the UAE will issue a regularly updated list showing names of approved and authorized agents.

All charges are subject to approval by the management and existing charges can be revised at any time after notifying the employer.

PAYROLL SOLUTION

The company offers payroll solutions for salary processing and disbursals in accordance with the Wages Protection System (WPS).

Product powered by: EDENRED(C3)

Features: Joyalukkas Exchange Co-branded payroll cards allow employer to deposit salary to their employees. Payroll can be used at all locations wherever MasterCard is accepted.

FOREIGN CURRENCY EXCHANGE

Joyalukkas Exchange offers the following services to exchange various foreign currencies to the customers across UAE.

Foreign Currency Buy

Foreign Currency Sell

Pricing: For Buy & Sell

Foreign currency bought and sold as per the prevailing exchange rate at the time of purchase or sell by the customers.

Charges: Maximum AED 5.00 (Excluding VAT)

Currency Availability

The Joyalukkas Exchange Management makes the decision regarding the kind of currency kept at each branch based on market demand and the local population.

Cancellations and Refunds

Once purchased or sold, the cancellation or refund can be done by virtue of new transaction with the prevailing rates. Customer should count the cash before leaving the counter as any claims or shortages that may arise later will not be the responsibility of the Exchange or its workers.

Inbound: Cash payouts

Joyalukkas Exchange also offers a hassle-free inbound remittance service, which allows our valued customers to withdraw the amount sent by their remitter from around the world. This service is supported by major global remittance partners.

Joyalukkas Exchange performs the proper due diligence to ensure the receiver identify

Joyalukkas Exchange doesn’t apply any charge on the disbursal amount

VALUE ADDED PRODUCTS

Joyalukkas Exchange Offers below mentioned value added products and services to the customers.

SEWA PAYMENTS

ETISALAT PAYMENTS

CREDIT CARD PAYMENT

LOCAL BANK DEPOSITS

VAT PAYMENT

PAN CARD

SSS/PAGIBIG/PHILHEALTH

MOBILE WALLET

AIR ARABIA PAYMENTS

MOBILE TOP UP

Service Charges: Min - AED.00 Max – AED 150(Excluding VAT)

General Terms & Conditions

WARNING: Additional fees may be levied by the correspondent bank/ partner or intermediary bank providing services to the beneficiary of remittances

WARNING: Charges and fees are subject to inaccurate information provided for remittances

WARNING: The actual time for credit of funds to the beneficiary account may differ from estimates due to increased scrutiny of transactions by correspondent bank/ partner or intermediary bank providing services to the beneficiary of remittances.

WARNING: Refunds against cancellation or rejection of remittance transactions returned unpaid for whatsoever reasons will be made only at our prevailing buying rate or at the rate at which we issued the transaction, whichever is lower. In case of a customer mistake, the refund will not include the costs of transmission, deductions from the beneficiary bank, charges associated with cancellation, or additional costs incurred.

WARNING: Reissuance or reprocessing of remittance transactions for any reason is subject to our charges and rate differences, wherever applicable.

WARNING: Transactions initiated against the non-cash transactions will be processed only after realization of funds in Joyalukkas account.

WARNING: Joyalukkas Exchange may refuse to execute any requests, instructions or services requested by the Customer if the Customer fails to comply with the necessary procedures, or if the information or data are incorrect or are in violation of the applicable laws and regulations.

WARNING: Before you leave the counter, please count your money and get a receipt for the transaction. Joyalukkas Exchange and its staff shall not be responsible for any subsequent claims or shortages. Joyalukkas Exchange retains the right to recover any extra money paid to the customer as a result of mistakes and oversights.
